body: Yes, something along the lines of this. For admin users, it should not make a difference whether or not the team is accepted - I would in fact generally remove the admins here in this ability, as orga has their own team form (there you can simply enable all). And I would probably do the check for `accepted?` first.

And I would probably do the check for accepted? first.
body_text: Yes, something along the lines of this. For admin users, it should not make a difference whether or not the team is accepted - I would in fact generally remove the admins here in this ability, as orga has their own team form (there you can simply enable all). And I would probably do the check for accepted? first.
